name: rspsbca
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))

stmt.origin: imp(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wral(s0, c1, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Restricted quantifier version of Axiom 4 of [Mendelson] p. 69. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2005.)
